docblock.description: An instance of this class is used to manage MIME content for posts.
docblock.long-description:
require_once('Mime.php');

$mime=new Mime();
$mime->createMimeSchema('relation_name',1);

docblock.description: An instance of this class represents a Database helper to manage database operations.
docblock.long-description:
require_once('Database.php');

$resultset=Database::get('table_name','columns','criterion');

docblock.description: The database connection object
The prefix used for all tables in the database used by the engine
Connects to the database server and the required database
Disconnects from the database
Fetches data from the database
Inserts data into the database
Updates data in the database
Deletes data from the database
Executes a user-specified query on the database
Fetches the database prefix used
This file contains the event handler for implicit events registered in the engine.

$settings=array('sex'=>1,'dob'=>1);
$priv->setPrivacy(userid,$settings);

docblock.long-description:

$data=array('sex'=>'male','location'=>'Honolulu');
$prof->createProfile(userid,$data);

docblock.description: An instance of this class is used to manage user accounts in the social network.
docblock.long-description:
require_once('Account.php');

$acc=new Account();
$data=array('firstname'=>'Frisby','lastname'=>'Developer','email'=>'name@example.com');
$acc->createAccount($data);
